column1: Smoque BBQ////If you love smoked meats and barbeque
column2: go here! Don't waste your time anywhere else. Food is GREAT! You may need to stand in line to place your order
column3: but if you need something additional
column4: a server places that order for you and takes your money for you. That is a big plus. We have been going to Smoque since it opened. It only gets better!
